set(STD -std=c99)
set(WARN -Wall)
set(OPT -Os)
set(R_CFLAGS  $(STD) $(WARN) $(OPT) $(DEBUG) $(CFLAGS) -DHDR_MALLOC_INCLUDE=\"hdr_redis_malloc.h\")
set(R_LDFLAGS= $(LDFLAGS))
set(DEBUG -g)
set(R_CC  $(CC) $(R_CFLAGS))
set(R_LD $(CC) $(R_LDFLAGS))
set(AR ar)
set(ARFLAGS rcs)
add_library(hdr_histogram.h STATIC hdr_histogram.c)
# target_compile_options(hdrhistogram PUBLIC ${R_CFLAGS})
# add_executable(hdrhistogram_test hdr_tests.h)
# target_link_libraries(hdrhistogram_test hdrhistogram)
